ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Associate Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 15:21 IST
 Indian Council of Agricultural Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Andhra Pradesh |  Salary : 61,000 to 67,000




FOLLOW

Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Andhra Pradesh.

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Research Associate 	01	M.Sc., Ph.D

Age Limit for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 61,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 67,000 /-per month.

Application fee for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Research Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview along with the required documents at the address given in the official notification.

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	22-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
